page.title: 13Clipstone Cricket Club
page.content: Clipstone Welfare Cricket Club which is one of many sports and social activities in{Clipstone}village, this year celebrates its Diamond Jubilee. The club was founded by three employees of Clipstone Colliery. The club was named Clipstone Colliery Cricket Club until 1975 when it was renamed Clipstone Welfare Cricket Club. The reason for the change of title was because the club was receiving financial assistance from C.I.S.W.O.,an organisation supported by colliery workers. The club has enjoyed the services of four secretaries, the present holder having been in office for 30 years. This year the club have teams entered in Division 1, Section A, Division 2, Section D of the Bassetlaw League, the North Notts Youth League, and the Mansfield Evening League. A team has
